dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, wait, this... this thing says the Second Coming is scheduled for the 20th of the month, this year? And all users will achieve Nirvana? What even is this?

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The launch of the project was timed to coincide with the main Islamic holiday Eid al-Adha, which falls on July 20 this year.
